title: go-tour/gotour: "Format Source Code" incorrectly formats code
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Either navigate to http://tour.golang.org/#27 or http://127.0.0.1:3999/#27 if running
locally.
2. Select "Format Source Code" from the Run menu.

What is the expected output?
Correctly gofmt formatted Go source code.


What do you see instead?
Incorrectly formatted code.


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g and whatever golang.org runs.


Which operating system are you using?
Linux.


Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
tip


Please provide any additional information below.
The browser I'm using is FF20.0.
